languages.text: "Красный жрец, даруй мне крови своей. Через гадание я узнаю, не зреет ли на флагмане скверна, как на судне подобных тебе".
"Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."
languages.original_text: "Красный жрец, даруй мне крови своей. Через гадание я узнаю, не зреет ли на флагмане скверна, как на судне подобных тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."
"Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."
"Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."
"Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."
"Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."

languages.text: "Roter Priester, gewährt mir Euer Blut. Durch Prophetie werde ich wissen, ob Verderbnis auf dem Flaggschiff schwelt, wie sie es auf dem Schiff der roten Priester tut."
languages.original_text: "Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."

traits.locale_text: "Roter Priester, gewährt mir Euer Blut. Durch Prophetie werde ich wissen, ob Verderbnis auf dem Flaggschiff schwelt, wie sie es auf dem Schiff der roten Priester tut."

languages.text: « Donnez-moi votre sang, prêtre rouge. La divination me dira si la corruption sévit sur le vaisseau amiral comme sur le bâtiment de vos semblables. »
languages.original_text: "Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."

traits.locale_text: « Donnez-moi votre sang, prêtre rouge. La divination me dira si la corruption sévit sur le vaisseau amiral comme sur le bâtiment de vos semblables. »

languages.text: «Sacerdote rojo, deme su sangre. Mediante la adivinación, podré saber si la corrupción anida en la nave insignia como hace en la de los sacerdotes rojos».
languages.original_text: "Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."

traits.locale_text: «Sacerdote rojo, deme su sangre. Mediante la adivinación, podré saber si la corrupción anida en la nave insignia como hace en la de los sacerdotes rojos».

languages.text: 「赤の司祭よ、その血を私に与えたまえ。赤の司祭の船と同じように、旗艦にも腐敗が蔓延しているのかどうか、ディビネーションを通して知ることができる」
languages.original_text: "Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."

traits.locale_text: 「赤の司祭よ、その血を私に与えたまえ。赤の司祭の船と同じように、旗艦にも腐敗が蔓延しているのかどうか、ディビネーションを通して知ることができる」

languages.text: “红袍神甫，把你的血给我吧。我可以通过占卜，了解这艘旗舰上的腐化是不是像那些红袍神甫的船一样糟糕。”
languages.original_text: "Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."

traits.locale_text: “红袍神甫，把你的血给我吧。我可以通过占卜，了解这艘旗舰上的腐化是不是像那些红袍神甫的船一样糟糕。”

languages.original_text: "Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."

languages.text: "Kızıl rahip, bana kanını bahşet. Tıpkı kızıl rahibin gemisi gibi sancak gemisine de yozlaşmanın bulaşıp bulaşmadığını kehanet aracılığıyla öğreneceğim."
languages.original_text: "Red priest, grant me your blood. Through divination I will know if corruption festers on the flagship as it does on the red priests' vessel."
